title: Marktng Resrch Analytcs
description: This course covers the fundamentals of the analytical aspects of marketing research. The course has an applied orientation with application to contemporary issues in marketing.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MGT 3300 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MGT 2250 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECON 2250 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PUBP 3120 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
